title: M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Monthly Series Ratio 4x
description: This is a variation of the M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Monthly Series dataset. It is filtered to limit the history to be 4x the forecast length which is 12 time steps. This dataset comprises 80 timeseries at monthly frequency, each spanning 324 months, randomly sampled from the M4 forecasting competition. These series provide a consistent length of historical window and are ideal for exploring long-term trends and seasonalities. The M4 dataset contains series drawn from across various sectors.
